whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.welcome: Welcome to the latest version of {{appName}}!

0.9.2.title: Settings & Configuration
features: âš™ï¸ Game path settings - manually configure your game installation path for better compatibility

0.9.0.title: Mod Management & System Improvements
features: ğŸ“‹ Mods ordering - organize your mods exactly how you want them
ğŸ” Local package scanning - automatically detect existing mods in your game directory
ğŸ“Š Reporting system - help improve the app by reporting issues
ğŸ§ Fixed Linux builds and scroll issues with pre-bundled GLS
âœ¨ Some UI & UX polish
ğŸ” Search persistence through navigation

0.8.2.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements
features: ğŸ› Fixed various bugs and improved stability
âš¡ Performance improvements and optimizations

0.8.1.title: Technical Improvements
features: ğŸ”§ Updated to use HTTP plugin for all API calls for improved reliability

0.8.0.title: Major Features & UI Updates + New Languages
features: ğŸ“¤ Support for local mods is here!
ğŸµ Added volume slider for audio mod previews
ğŸŒ Added 7 new languages: Arabic, German, French, Polish, Russian, Turkish, and Swiss German
ğŸ”½ Drag and drop mod files directly into the app
ğŸŒ™ Light mode now follows your system theme automatically
âœ¨ Filter settings now persist when navigating between pages, we also added "Exclude" filter mode
ğŸ“± Added bottom bar with status indicators for mods, downloads

0.7.0.title: Major Features & UI Refresh
features: ğŸ“¦ Multi-file download support - choose which files to install when mods have multiple archives
ğŸ”’ NSFW content filtering with user controls for safe browsing
âš™ï¸ Advanced gameinfo.gi management for better mod compatibility
ğŸ¨ Brand new logo design and enhanced UI styling throughout the app
ğŸš€ Improved launch button animations and enhanced settings layout
ğŸ“ Smart scroll position management - keep your scroll position while browsing mods
ğŸ” Enhanced search relevance and sorting capabilities for better mod discovery

0.6.1.title: Deep Links & Improvements
features: ğŸ”— Added support for 1-click install links on GameBanana

0.6.0.title: Audio Mod Support & Launch Options
features: ğŸµ Added support for audio mods - customize your Deadlock sounds
ğŸš€ Improved launch options handling - no longer assumes "+" prefix requirement
ğŸ”§ Enhanced mod compatibility and installation process
âš¡ Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.1.title: Performance & Bug Fixes
features: ğŸš€ Added virtualization to mods page for significantly better performance
ğŸ”§ Fixed "last updated" sort option not reflecting actual mod timestamps
ğŸ·ï¸ Added category and hero filters for better mod discovery
âŒ Added clear button to search input for quick search reset
ğŸ” Improved filtering and searching functionality on the mods page
ğŸ³ Resolved Docker compatibility issues
ğŸ¨ Enhanced mod card layout and styling
ğŸ“– Updated UI to acknowledge GameBanana as data source
âš¡ Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.0.title: Stability & New Features
features: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Fixed Windows crash issue with single-instance plugin
âœ¨ Added this "What's New" dialog to showcase updates
âš ï¸ New outdated mod warning system for better mod management
ğŸ® Updated champion roster with latest Deadlock heroes
ğŸ”§ Fixed Custom Launch Options not respecting enabled/disabled status
ğŸ¨ Enhanced UI components and layout improvements
ğŸ”§ Various stability improvements and bug fixes

0.4.0.title: Better Download Management & UI Refresh
features: âœ¨ Refreshed user interface with improved navigation
